Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 字体的系统名称,如 - 微软雅黑

Include.comment: 包含xml文件内容,用于分割xml文件到多个xml

Attribute.name: sizebox
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动改变窗口大小的边距,如(4,4,6,6)

Attribute.name: caption
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动的标题栏大小的边距,最后一个参数是指离上边框的距离,如(0,0,0,28)

Attribute.name: bktrans
Attribute.comment: 窗口是否使用静态透明背景,如(false)

Attribute.name: showdirty
Attribute.comment: 绘制脏矩形(屏幕上更新的区域被称为脏矩形)

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 控件名字，同一窗口内必须唯一，如(testbtn)

Attribute.name: pos
Attribute.comment: 位置，如果为float控件则指定位置和大小，否则只指定大小,如(0,0,100,100)

Attribute.name: relativepos
Attribute.comment: 设置相对移动，float为真时，分别表示横纵向位移值，横纵向缩放值，移动单位建议50或100

Attribute.name: bkcolor2
Attribute.comment: 背景渐变色2,和bkcolor配合使用,如(0xFFFFFF00)

Attribute.name: focusbordercolor
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时边框的颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: colorhsl
Attribute.comment: 本控件的颜色是否随窗口的hsl变化而变化,如(false)

Attribute.name: bordersize
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或RECT类型的值。当值为ING时则左、上、右、下都用该值作为宽。值为RECT类型时则分别设置左、上、右、下的边框

Attribute.name: leftbordersize
Attribute.comment: 左边边框大小，如(1)，设置该值大于0，则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: topbordersize
Attribute.comment: 顶部边框大小，如(1)，设置该值大于0，则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: rightbordersize
Attribute.comment: 右边边框大小，如(1)，设置该值大于0，则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: bottombordersize
Attribute.comment: 底部边框大小，如(1)，设置该值大于0，则将忽略bordersize属性的设置

Attribute.name: borderstyle
Attribute.comment: 边框样式的设置,数值范围0-5

Attribute.name: bkimage
Attribute.comment: 背景图片,如(bk.bmp或file='aaa.jpg' res='' restype='0' dest='0,0,0,0' source='0,0,0,0' corner='0,0,0,0' mask='#FF0000' fade='255' hole='false' xtiled='false' ytiled='false')

Attribute.name: tooltip
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮提示,如(请在这里输入你的密码),换行使用\r\n

Attribute.name: enabled
Attribute.comment: 是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: mouse
Attribute.comment: 本控件是否可以响应鼠标操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: keyboard
Attribute.comment: 非CButtonUI类忽略该值，为false时不支持TAB_STOP,且该对象不处理键盘信息

Attribute.name: virtualwnd
Attribute.comment: 使用虚拟窗口名称,TNotifyUI的sVirtualWnd可查看

Attribute.name: mousechild
Attribute.comment: 本控件的子控件是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: vscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 竖向滚动条属性,如 - thumbsize="16"etc...

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 横向滚动条属性,如 - thumbsize="16"etc...

Attribute.name: childpadding
Attribute.comment: 子控件之间的额外距离,如(4)

Attribute.name: sepheight
Attribute.comment: 分隔符高度,正负表示分隔符在顶部还是底部,如(4)

Attribute.name: sepimm
Attribute.comment: 拖动分隔符是否立即改变大小,如(false)

Attribute.name: sepwidth
Attribute.comment: 分隔符宽,正负表示分隔符在左边还是右边,如(-4)

Attribute.name: sepimm
Attribute.comment: 拖动分隔符是否立即改变大小,如(false)

TabLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu tabselect windowinit(root)

AnimationTabLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu tabselect windowinit(root)

ChildLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu tabselect windowinit(root)

ActiveX.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu showactivex windowinit(root)

Combo.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu dropdown itemselect windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: dropbox
Attribute.comment: 弹框的外布局属性,如 - broadsize="16"etc...

Attribute.name: itemaltbk
Attribute.comment: item是否使用隔行交替背景

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotimage
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景图片

Attribute.name: mousewheelselect
Attribute.comment: 是否支持多个item同时打开,如(false)

Attribute.name: itemendellipsis
Attribute.comment: item句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

ComboBox.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root)

Comment.comment: 增加arrowimage属性,一张图片平均分成5份,Normal/Hot/Pushed/Focused/Disabled(必须有source属性), 是否显示文本

Attribute.name: endellipsis
Attribute.comment: 句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: pathellipsis
Attribute.comment: 路径句末中显示不全是否使用\\..\\代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: textcolor
Attribute.comment: 字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: disabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: disabled字体颜色，0表示使用默认disabled字体颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: showhtml
Attribute.comment: 是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: enabledeffect
Attribute.comment: 是否使用字体特效，使用下面文字特效属性必须该属性设置为true方有效

Attribute.name: transstroke
Attribute.comment: 字体描边的颜色透明度 0-255

Text.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu link windowinit(root)
Text.comment: 控件宽度自适应字体宽度,鼠标消息不穿透

Button.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: hotforeimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的前景状态图片

Attribute.name: hotforeimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的前景状态图片

Attribute.name: hotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: hottextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: pushedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: focusedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Option.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: selectedhotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮宁并选中时的状态图片

Attribute.name: selectedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中状态背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selectedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中状态字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

CheckBox.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: isstretchfore
Attribute.comment: 指定前景图片是否缩放显示

Slider.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu valuechanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: thumbimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标按下状态图片

SliderControl.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu valuechanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: thumbimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: forebkimage
Attribute.comment: 前景图片的下层绘制背景图片

Attribute.name: foreimage
Attribute.comment: 前景图片,不是与滑槽大小的图片并isstretchfore为false的话,可以指定source='0,0,0,0'重新设为缩放显示

Attribute.name: insetslot
Attribute.comment: 滑动控件的内边距,定位滑槽的位置,如(2,2,2,2),真实的滑槽是先与滑块中心距离相减然后再应用Inset的

Attribute.name: thumbcenter
Attribute.comment: 滑块中心没有设置的话自动计算为滑块大小中心,如(10,10)

Attribute.name: reverse
Attribute.comment: 反向显示,暂时没有用的参数

Attribute.name: button1normalimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button1hotimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button1pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button1disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: button2normalimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button2hotimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button2pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button2disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: railnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识普通状态图片

Attribute.name: railhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: railpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: raildisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: bkhotimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: bkpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: showbutton1
Attribute.comment: 是否显示左或上按钮,如(true)

Attribute.name: showbutton2
Attribute.comment: 是否显示右或下按钮,如(true)

Attribute.name: showemptybuttonrect
Attribute.comment: 绘制按钮的位置,用于debug,如(true)

Edit.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu return textchanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: nativebkcolor
Attribute.comment: windows原生edit控件的背景颜色,如(0xFFFFFFFF)

RichEdit.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu return windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autovscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入竖向滚动,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autohscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入横向滚动,如(true)

List.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu itemselect windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: header
Attribute.comment: 是否显示表头,如(true,不显示需设为hidden)

Attribute.name: scrollselect
Attribute.comment: 是否随滚动改变选中项,如(false)

Attribute.name: multiexpanding
Attribute.comment: 是否支持多个item同时打开,如(false)

Attribute.name: itemendellipsis
Attribute.comment: item句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: itemaltbk
Attribute.comment: item是否使用隔行交替背景

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotimage
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemshowhtml
Attribute.comment: item是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: selecthorizontal
Attribute.comment: 是否可以选择垂直列,如(false)

Attribute.name: dragable
Attribute.comment: 是否可拖动改变大小,如(true)

Attribute.name: endellipsis
Attribute.comment: 句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: textcolor
Attribute.comment: 字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色,如(0xFFFF0000)

Attribute.name: showhtml
Attribute.comment: 是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

ListLabelElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick windowinit(root)

ListTextElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick link windowinit(root)

ListContainerElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick itemexpanded itemcollapsed windowinit(root)

TreeView.notifies: selectchanged setfocus killfocus timer menu itemselect windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: visiblefolderbtn
Attribute.comment: 是否显示展开与收缩按钮对象

Attribute.name: itemminwidth
Attribute.comment: 设置Item的最小宽度，当hscrollbar为真且itemminwidth大于TreeView宽度时才会显示横向滚动条

Attribute.name: selitemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时且鼠标进入时的文本颜色

TreeNode.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick itemexpanded itemcollapsed windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: horizattr
Attribute.comment: item虚线、复选框、展开与收缩、文本按钮等对象容器属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: dotlineattr
Attribute.comment: item虚线对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: folderattr
Attribute.comment: item展开与收缩按钮对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: checkboxattr
Attribute.comment: item复选框对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: itemattr
Attribute.comment: item按钮对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: selhotitemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时且鼠标进入时的文本颜色

Attribute.name: menualign
Attribute.comment: 弹出菜单的对于点的对齐方式lefttop,righttop,leftbottom,rightbottom

Attribute.name: colorkey
Attribute.comment: 窗体中的所有颜色为RGB(colorkey,colorkey,colorkey)的地方将变为透明

Attribute.name: alpha
Attribute.comment: colorkey的地方将变为全透明,而其它地方根据bAlpha参数确定透明度
